abstract: Just days after losing a bidding war for Securitas Direct, Stanley Black & Decker said on Monday that it was making an all-cash tender offer for the security company Niscayah.
snippet: Just days after losing a bidding war for Securitas Direct, Stanley Black & Decker said on Monday that it was making an all-cash tender offer for the security company Niscayah.
lead_paragraph: Just days after losing out on a deal for Securitas Direct, Stanley Black & Decker said on Monday that it was making an all-cash tender offer for the security company Niscayah worth about 6.5 billion Swedish kronor, or $1 billion.

headline.main: Stanley Black & Decker Bids $1 Billion for Security Company
